name: Falling Chicken
description:
Play as chicken throug six level and try to end as few deaths as possible. You can also play each lvl on best time. You need just to use your arrows to controll character and get to finish portal. On the way you came across to spikes,long jumps but also checpoint to save your postion. You can press escape to pause the game or leave.

It's my firs complet game so I would be very gratefull for any feedback to improve myself.
